name: O-Racer
description:
O-Racer is a fascinating fantastic race. You will find the cold atmosphere of deep space, asteroids and black holes. Get into the cab of a stylish car and conquer all 9 tracks of a distant galaxy with your skill.

Control in desktop mode: WASD keys or arrows.
Control on mobile devices: Accelerometer and virtual buttons, or a virtual joystick (see settings in the main menu of the game).
